name: Hesther's Odyssey (PC Adventure Game)
description:
Hesther's Odyssey- You are Hesther and your objective is to find your missing brother-Hemin!

This is my first game with Unity! This was a learning Unity project for me but I really enjoyed getting into unity and c#.

Bonus: This game is based on my little nephew and niece. The game also features some cute dialogues and voice acting from them lol!
